Articles.Content:
literally around 10 minutes ago, i suggested a RP sub-forums...

well, i got my answers...

But, if my joke religion, the "krakenist`s" are not allowed, then can they just be classified as a group? I mean, like a fictional group, not a RP faction. So why not a sub-forum for fictional KSP groups (or companies, either way its up to what you think they are).

Sounds pretty much like RP-ing to me.

Besides, if we allow one particular group to get its own subforum, the forums will very quickly be filled by a large number empty subforums. Also, religion is part of the topics banned from the forum; may it be real of fictive (you'll notice that RP factions, "groups", fictional or real religions often end up the same with people going at war against each other).

And these kind of suggestions should go in Kerbal Network, this subforum is made for suggestions related to the game, not the forums.
This belongs to Kerbal Network.. I'll report it to move it there.

Moved to the Kerbal Network.

The problem isn't with the label "Role Play", it's with the associated behaviors. Changing it to "groups" or "companies" doesn't change that.

I get that you really, really want to roleplay, but this forum is not the place for it.
This is not going to happen. That's unfortunate, but roleplaying is the worst mess to ever hit this forum.
